Myka Sutherlin right meets Peyton Toto left at the mound while facing UC Davis on March  at LaRue Field PERIOD Devyn Billingsley  CSUF Athletics

Softball pitcher Myka Sutherlin was announced as the Big Wests Pitcher of the Week after her performance in the Titans conference opening series against UC Davis this past weekend PERIOD

This marked the Arizona natives second time earning the honor her first was after her performance during the Mary Nutter Tournament from Feb PERIOD   Feb PERIOD  PERIOD This is the fifth time this season a Titan has received a conference honor PERIOD

Through the series Sutherlin struckout a total of  opponents in  innings PERIOD In the first game on March  where Davis won  Sutherlin racked up six strikes in six innings but allowed two runs for the Aggies PERIOD On March  Sutherlin bounced back and upped her game with seven strikes within seven innings as Fullerton won  PERIOD

Of the five pitchers Sutherlin lands as the most used pitcher on the team with a current total of  innings pitched PERIOD She has allowed the second most runs on the team at  but has struck out the most players with  strikeouts PERIOD

So far this season Sutherlins most strikeouts in a single game is  which she achieved in two separate games PERIOD The first was against Arizona on Feb PERIOD   CSUF won  PERIOD The second was on March  against Sacramento State  the Titans also won  PERIOD

The secondbest game for the pitcher was against Idaho State on Feb. with nine strikeouts PERIOD Despite allowing three runs the team pulled through and defeated Idaho  PERIOD

In a  loss to Boston University on March  Sutherlin showed up with six strikes in . innings pitched PERIOD

The Titans will end their current roadtrip in a threegame series against Cal State Bakersfield on the road PERIOD The first pitch is scheduled for  p.m PERIOD on Saturday March  PERIOD
